content: knitted starghan size 35 diameter center to end of star point = 21 5 yarn bernat softee baby dk weight in purple green blue and chiffon print 1 skein each needles us 6 set of 6 dpns 24 and 36 circulars if you prefer to cast on with the 2-circulars or magic loop techniques you will not need the dpns gauge garter stitch worked in round 20 sts/4 this pattern should work in any weight yarn choose needles appropriate to yarn weight abbreviations kfb knit into front and back of stitch k knit p purl pm place marker yo yarn over m1 make one stitch using the lifted loop technique k2tog knit two together ssk slip 2 sts as if to knit knit together through back of loop using circular cast on or method of your choice cast on 5 stitches and join in the round row 1 kfb every stitch 10 sts row 2 *kfb k* 5 times 15 sts row 3 purl around separating stitches onto 5 dpns 3 sts per needle or pm every 3 sts using a unique marker for beg of round 15 sts row 4 *k yo k yo k* 5 times 25 sts row 5 and all odd row purl row 6 *k2tog m1 yo k yo m1 ssk* 35 sts row 8 *k2tog m1 k yo k yo k m1 ssk* 45 sts this central grouping in italics will be repeated in the center of every even-row repeat row 10 *k2tog k1 m1 k yo k yo k m1 k1 ssk* 55 sts row 12 *k2tog m1 k2 k yo k yo k k2 m1 ssk* 65 sts row 14 *k2tog k3 m1 k yo k yo k m1 k3 ssk* 75 sts row 16 *k2tog m1 k4 k yo k yo k k4 m1 ssk* 85 sts row 18 *k2tog k5 m1 k yo k yo k m1 k5 ssk* 95 sts row 20 *k2tog m1 k6 k yo k yo k k6 m1 ssk* 105 sts by now the pattern should be obvious in addition to the two additional stitches created by the yo s in the central motif two additional stitches are created for each repeat they alternate between being created at the edges of the repeat type a row immediately after the k2tog or before the ssk and the center of the repeat type b row immediately before and after the k yo k yo k center rib i found the color stripes a very useful tool to keep track of where i was in the pattern for my blanket i did 12 row 6 knit and 6 purl per color knit row 1 3 and 5 of each color were type a and knit row 2 4 and 6 of each color were type b continue in pattern until blanket is desired size ending on purl row cast off in pattern including yo s and m1 s finishing weave in ends block version 1 0 9/12/2008 this
